data.title: Mountie Fresh Basic Needs Resources
data.meta_description: The Mt. SAC Mountie Fresh Basic Nees Resources is a comprehensive campus-wide effort that serves students experiencing housing instability, food insecurity, and other emergency/crisis situations.
data.text:
Basic Needs Resources Program

Mission

Our mission is to provide trauma-informed, holistic, student-centered, services to Mt. San Antonio College students. In our commitment to the equitable advancement of economic opportunities and academic success of Mt. SAC students, we aim to minimize the financial burdens of our students facing housing, food, and other basic needs insecurities by raising awareness and providing access to on and off-campus support services.

The Mt. SAC Basic Needs Resources is a comprehensive campus-wide effort that serves students experiencing housing instability, food insecurity, and other emergency/crisis situations.

The program goals are to provide students in need with:

Food Resources

Housing Referrals

Case-Management Support

Apply for CalFresh benefits from the comfort of your own home: Our partners at "Get CalFresh.org" have created a Mt. SAC personalized link for students who wish to apply for CalFresh benefits on their own and at their own pace! This link allows you to complete a short 10 minute application to find out if you and your household are eligible! CalFresh Outreach staff from Mountie Fresh Basic Needs Resources are available to provide support at any point of the application process!
